dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5104 IH: National Dam Safety Program Reauthorization Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Edwards (for himself, Ms. Kuster, Mr. Williams of New York, Ms. Schrier, Mr. Newhouse, and Mr. Moolenaar) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the National Dam Safety Program Act to reauthorize that Act, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the National Dam Safety Program Reauthorization Act of 2023.

section.header: Reauthorization of National Dam Safety Program
section.text: Section 14 of the National Dam Safety Program Act (33 U.S.C. 467j) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(1), by striking 2023 and inserting 2028;
in subsection (b), by striking 2023 and inserting 2028;
in subsection (c), by striking 2023 and inserting 2028;
in subsection (d), by striking 2023 and inserting 2028;
in subsection (e), by striking 2023 and inserting 2028; and
in subsection (f), by striking 2023 and inserting 2028.
